snippet: Nine foreigners from South Africa, Britain and India, part of a group of 20 travelers, have been jailed since Friday.
abstract: Nine foreign tourists are held by authorities in Chinese jail following accusations that they watched 'terrorist propaganda videos' in their hotel; none have been officially charged with wrongdoing.
lead_paragraph: Nine foreigners from South Africa, Britain and India, part of a group of 20 travelers, have been jailed since Friday.

headline.main: China Says Detained Tourists Were Watching Terrorist Propaganda
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Tourist Group Detained
